sections.name: Table 1 – Vehicles Launched Last 6 Months
sections.description: Summarise vehicles launched in the last 6 months in the AU market. Include Manufacturer, Model, Launch Date, Units Sold, Price AUD, and Confidence rating. Focus on key insights rather than raw numbers.

sections.name: Table 2 – Future Releases
sections.description: Summarise upcoming vehicle releases, including expected arrival window and confidence rating. Highlight notable trends or anticipated market impact.

sections.name: Regulatory & Compliance Summary
sections.description: Summarise relevant regulatory and compliance developments across key regions (AU, EU, CN). Include rules, restrictions, and notes that could impact vehicle products or market strategy.

sections.name: Consumer Search Insight
sections.description: Analyse recent search trends and spikes in interest. Highlight emerging consumer behaviours, high-demand features, or areas of product opportunity.

sections.name: Executive Summary – Product Actions
sections.description: Provide concise, actionable recommendations or next-step priorities based on market data, regulatory updates, and consumer insights. Present items in priority order where possible.
